title: Our own splash arts in the new client
body:
Hello!
I was wondering if there is any way to change splash arts into my own? I don't want to use third party application if possible, but if there is no other way then this app needs to cooperate with a new client. Do you know any solution?

replies.body: Sort through the client files, find the image, replace it manually.
I tried but nothing has changed.
I'm still wondering about this too are there any solutions?
Use Wooxy, it works with the new client.
Well, it doesn't seem to work for me. Do you know any tutorials? I mean up-to-date ones. I'd found nice and detailed tutorial but it was for legacy client.
Unless I'm very mistaken, you can set it up on the legacy client then it will be working on both.
